drop_database: Remove the 'test' database if it exists.
create_database: Create a new database named 'test' if it doesn't already exist.
drop_tables: Remove the 'Members' table if it exists.
Remove the 'Books' table if it exists.
Remove the 'BorrowingRecords' table if it exists.
create_tables: Create a new 'Members' table with columns for MemberID (auto-incrementing), FirstName, LastName, and JoinDate.
Create a new 'Books' table with columns for BookID (auto-incrementing), Title, Author, and ISBN.
Create a new 'BorrowingRecords' table with columns for RecordID (auto-incrementing), MemberID, BookID, BorrowDate, and ReturnDate, with foreign key relationships to the Members and Books tables.

delete: Remove the member with ID 1 from the Members table.
Remove all members named John from the Members table.
Remove the member named Doe who joined on January 15, 2022 from the Members table.
Remove all members who joined before January 1, 2021 from the Members table.
Remove all members named Jane or with the last name Smith from the Members table.
Remove all members with ID greater than 5 from the Members table.
Remove all members with the last name Johnson from the Members table.
Remove all members who joined between January 1, 2020 and December 31, 2021 from the Members table.
Remove all members whose first name starts with 'A' from the Members table.
Remove members with IDs 2, 3, or 4 from the Members table.
Remove the book with ID 1 from the Books table.
Remove the book titled '1984' from the Books table.
Remove the book by George Orwell with ISBN 9780451524935 from the Books table.
Remove the book with ISBN 9781234567890 from the Books table.
Remove all books by J.K. Rowling or titled 'Harry Potter' from the Books table.
Remove all books with ID greater than 10 from the Books table.
Remove all books by Mark Twain from the Books table.
Remove all books with 'Guide' in the title from the Books table.
Remove all books with no ISBN from the Books table.
Remove books with IDs 5, 6, or 7 from the Books table.

Remove all borrowing records with no return date from the BorrowingRecords table.
Remove the borrowing record for member 4 borrowing book 2 from the BorrowingRecords table.
Remove all borrowing records made before January 1, 2022 from the BorrowingRecords table.
Remove all borrowing records with return dates between January 1, 2023 and December 31, 2023 from the BorrowingRecords table.
Remove all borrowing records with ID greater than 10 from the BorrowingRecords table.
Remove borrowing records for members with IDs 5, 6, or 7 from the BorrowingRecords table.
update: Change the name of the member with ID 1 to John Doe.
Change the join date to January 1, 2024 for the member with ID 2.
Change the first name to Jane for the member with ID 3 who joined on June 15, 2023.
Change the last name to Smith for the member with ID 4 or who joined on May 20, 2023.
Change the name to Alice Brown for the member with ID 5.
Change the join date to July 21, 2023 for the member with ID 6 and last name Johnson.
Change the first name to Robert for the member with ID 7.
Change the last name to Miller for the member with ID 8 who joined on August 30, 2023.
Change the join date to February 12, 2024 for the member with ID 9 or first name Emily.
Change the name to Emma Wilson for the member with ID 10.
Change the title of the book with ID 1 to 'New Book Title'.
Change the author of the book with ID 2 to 'Updated Author'.
Change the ISBN to 9781234567890 for the book with ID 3 and title 'Old Book Title'.
Change the title to 'Another Title' for the book with ID 4 or authored by 'Some Author'.
Change the author to 'Different Author' and ISBN to 9780987654321 for the book with ID 5.
Change the title to 'Updated Title' for the book with ID 6 and ISBN 9781112223334.
Change the ISBN to 9784445556667 for the book with ID 7.
Change the author to 'New Author' for the book with ID 8 and title 'Specific Title'.
Change the title to 'A New Title' for the book with ID 9 or ISBN 9785556667778.
Change the author to 'Final Author' and ISBN to 9782223334445 for the book with ID 10.
Change the return date to March 15, 2024 for the borrowing record with ID 1.
Change the borrow date to November 1, 2023 for the borrowing record with ID 2.
Change the return date to December 25, 2023 for the borrowing record with ID 3 and member ID 1.
Change the borrow date to January 10, 2024 for the borrowing record with ID 4 or book ID 2.
Change the member ID to 3 and book ID to 5 for the borrowing record with ID 5.
Change the return date to February 20, 2024 for the borrowing record with ID 6 and member ID 4.
Change the borrow date to October 5, 2023 for the borrowing record with ID 7.
Change the return date to September 15, 2023 for the borrowing record with ID 8 and book ID 3.
Change the member ID to 2 and borrow date to April 1, 2024 for the borrowing record with ID 9 or return date May 15, 2024.
Change the return date to June 10, 2024 for the borrowing record with ID 10.

no_filtering: Retrieve all MemberIDs from the Members table.
Retrieve all BookIDs from the Books table.
Retrieve all RecordIDs from the BorrowingRecords table.
Retrieve all BookIDs from the Books table.
single_filtering: Find the MemberIDs of all members who joined on January 1, 2023.
Find the BookIDs of all books authored by George Orwell.
Find the RecordIDs of all borrowing records where the book hasn't been returned yet.
Find the MemberIDs of all members named John.
double_filtering: Find the MemberIDs of all members named Jane Doe.
Find the BookIDs of all books authored by Jane Austen or with ISBN 9780141439518.
Find the RecordIDs of all borrowing records for member 1 where the book has been returned.
Find the MemberIDs of all members named Emily who joined on May 1, 2022.
triple_filtering: Find the MemberIDs of all members named John Doe who joined on January 1, 2023.
Find the BookIDs of all books titled '1984', authored by George Orwell, or with ISBN 9780451524935.
Find the RecordIDs of all borrowing records for member 2 borrowing book 3 that haven't been returned yet.
Find the BookIDs of all books authored by Mark Twain, titled 'Adventures of Huckleberry Finn', or with ISBN 9780142437179.
range_filtering: Find the MemberIDs of all members who joined between January 1, 2020 and December 31, 2023.
Find the BookIDs of all books with IDs between 10 and 20.
Find the RecordIDs of all borrowing records made between January 1, 2022 and January 1, 2023.
Find the BookIDs of books with IDs between 5 and 15.
ranking: Retrieve all MemberIDs, ordered by join date from latest to earliest.
Retrieve all BookIDs, ordered by title alphabetically.
Retrieve all RecordIDs, ordered by borrow date from latest to earliest.
Retrieve all BookIDs, ordered by author name alphabetically.
count: Count the total number of members.
Count the total number of books.
Count the total number of borrowing records.
Count the total number of books.
single_table: Retrieve all MemberIDs from the Members table.
Retrieve all BookIDs from the Books table.
Retrieve all RecordIDs from the BorrowingRecords table.
Retrieve all BookIDs from the Books table.
double_table: Find the MemberIDs of all members who have borrowed any book.
Find the BookIDs of all books that have been borrowed by any member.
Find the RecordIDs of all borrowing records for book with ID 1.
Find the BookIDs of all books borrowed by member with ID 2.
three_table: Find the MemberIDs of all members who have borrowed any book, including book information.
Find the BookIDs of all books that have been borrowed by any member, including member information.
Find the RecordIDs of all borrowing records, including both member and book information.
Find the MemberIDs of all members who have borrowed book with ID 1, including book information.
